overview_of_class: Industrial designers focus on user experience. In DSGN 320, you will learn how human factors, aesthetics, and product semantics affect a product's success in the market. We use design research methods to develop product concepts, and sketching and prototyping to formulate, communicate, and test concepts.
name: Introduction to Industrial Design
title: MEAS DSGN 320-0-20 Introduction to Industrial Design

descriptions.name: Overview of class
